attributes.title: Made it snow in my house????
attributes.review: Listen, I have always heard great things about the Lord and Savior Trump. And while the demons in the corner of my room do nothing but scream about how god did not send him, but the devil did and I should avoid worshipping him should I want to save my place in the great heavens and beyond; I digress. I downloaded this app marveling the overwhelming white-washed glory-I MEAN patriotism I felt. But as soon as I saw his face my phone froze. LITERALLY! It became ice cold and I coulda sworn holding it a second longer would’ve given me hypothermia!! My skin began crawling with goosebumps that spelled out ALL LIVES MATTER. And I was so confused until I glanced up and saw it was SNOWING IN MY HOUSE!! Mounds of snowflakes began building up and I was scared outta my wits! The democrats musta broken into my house: I thought shaking! But upon closer inspection, I picked up one of the flakes and it read “Trump 2020” how could it be that this great president was a...a...snowflake!!! I frantically picked up another and it read “ALL LIVES MATTER” dear lord, I thought, could it be?? Another and another and another! “Crybabies” “there’s only two genders” “fox news is a great place for facts” “You’re offending my religion” “White supremacy” “the confederate flag isn’t racist” “I’m homophobic because my book says it’s unnatural” “Trump 2020” “Facts over feelings but only when the facts dont hurt my feeling because Trump 2020” “Blocking the road at protests is illegal so idc if police run people over even though the law allows people to be in the streets” “Blue lives matter even though it’s not a blue life it’s a blue shirt” “who will you call when you are getting robbed if there’s no police even though supreme court said the police aren’t legally required to protect you and they often fail too.” “Unborn lives matter but not the ones being abused in foster care and have no families they could NEVER have the cure for cancer it mUST be this fetus” It all became so clear to me. The true snowflakes, the ones who really fear change and like to think they’re special by ignoring the fact THEIR world is not THE world, were the people who support Trump. Oh gods I thought!! I deleted this app immediately. Would not recommend for more sensitive viewers, especially not the sheeple that wears his merch. One star. I fear for my life in America because it was never great and never will be if we don’t stand by the constitution. Oh and btw it stopped snowing in my house!! ✨🧚‍♂️✨🧚‍♂️✨Deleting the app is a great way to delete snowflakes 🧚‍♂️✨🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️
